name: Snake 3D (itch) (Yartarus)
description:
My personal interpretation of the basic idea of recreating the classic game Snake in 3D.

The game is played from a first person perspective, and there is no real up or down. Because of this and the fact your body gets in the way of finding the "apple" the game gets disorienting quickly, so be wary of motion sickness.

Controls with either the wasd or arrow keys.
